name: Despot Desires [Alpha Demo]
description:
Story Overview:
The Kutawa, a Crystal stone passed down through the Ages as Myth, Legend; A beautiful female Overlord bent on ending the human race, and a Hero trying to understand it all. Time doesn't matter but does Love?

Learn more about the Ancient Gem, join the hero in capturing the "Evil" Overload, then, build their lives in love or Burn it all in Lust, you choose.
//Play through their interactions Today\\

4k Screen Shots!

Please do, come Support the games continued creation.
And thank you for playing!
